description_text:
hola buenas, compre un freno de mano, el sowfware no funciona correctamente
y no me deja cambiar al configurador del freno, se queda bloqueado en el
configurador de los pedales y no me deja hacer nada porque puede ser?



Hello, I bought a handbrake, the software doesn't work properly and
won't let me change to the brake configurator, it gets stuck in the
pedal configurator and won't let me do anything, what could that be?

conversations.body_text: Hi ItalianCrazy22,  Please provide your order number and a screenshot showing the issue, and we will assist you right away.Â
